thought: The Slack action (action_2) is missing required parameters, especially the 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' fields. Without these, the Slack message cannot be sent and the workflow throws an error. I need to set these parameters properly to send messages to the #general channel with text messages.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to specify sending to a channel.
Set 'channelId' with mode 'name' and value 'general' to target #general channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' to send simple text messages.
Set 'text' parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text from input data.
Test Slack message sending with these parameters to fix the error.
criticism: Currently, the Slack action has empty parameters, causing execution failure. This is a critical missing configuration that must be fixed before the workflow can run successfully.

tool_input.comments: Send each commercial entry's Description, profit, and category to Slack channel #general as text messages.
